# title: "Design-Kit"

## Light Theme Logo

**Download**: [logo_light.svg](sandbox:/images/logo_light.svg)

```svg
<svg viewBox="0 0 480 120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <title>Sustainability Lab Logo - Light Mode</title>
  <line x1="110" y1="85" x2="110" y2="35" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <line x1="110" y1="85" x2="150" y2="85" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M 90.0 84.7 L 91.4 84.5 ... L 130.0 35.3"
        fill="none"
        stroke="#000000"
        stroke-width="3.5"
        stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <text x="165" y="65" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="32" font-weight="400" fill="#111111" letter-spacing="0.5px">
    SUSTAINABILITY
  </text>
  <text x="165" y="85" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="18" font-weight="300" fill="#555555" letter-spacing="3px">
    LAB
  </text>
</svg>
```
